name: Bullet Heaven (Dbrad, Morgz, FlavorMechanix)
description:
Flavor Mechanix Season 1, Episode 1: Bullet Heaven! Break into the realm of the gods and show them what for as you learn demonic skills as the main character, Ignacian. Are the gods really our saviors, or are they alien overlords? Or does it even matter?

Thanks for playing! This game was developed between August 1st-28th of 2022, and is the first in a series of month-long builds, so stay tuned for the rest of them! Next up: Mist and Mystery at the Avalon Inn.

Team: Daniel Bradley, Morgan Sapp, Lazarus Cain
